Fields.annote:
"\textbfPipe" is a sender's estimate of the number of bytes outstanding
      in the network.  This is used during recovery for limiting the
      sender's sending rate.  The pipe variable allows TCP to use
      fundamentally different congestion control than the algorithm
      specified in [\hrefhttps://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc5681RFC5681].  The congestion control algorithm using
      the pipe estimate is often referred to as the "pipe algorithm".

fast recovery algorithm
Fields.author: Blanton, E. and Allman, M. and Wang, L. and Jarvinen, I. and Kojo, M. and Nishida, Y.
Fields.title: A Conservative Loss Recovery Algorithm Based on Selective Acknowledgment (SACK) for TCP
A Portable SCTP Userland Stack. Contribute to Sctplab/Usrsctp Development by Creating an Account on GitHub
